textBeforeTable: After each task, return to this page to mark the task "done " and continue the sequence. Follow this sequence of tasks to install Unified WIM and EIM File Server. Install Unified WIM and EIM File Server for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Cisco Media Blender for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Unified WIM and EIM Services Server for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Unified WIM and EIM Web Server for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Unified WIM and EIM Messaging Server for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Unified WIM and EIM Application Server for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Unified WIM and EIM Database Server for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Unified WIM and EIM File Server for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Cisco Media Blender for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Unified WIM and EIM Services Server for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Unified WIM and EIM Web Server for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Unified WIM and EIM Messaging Server for 120 Multimedia Agent Deployment Install Unified WIM and EIM Application Server for 120 Multimedia
textAfterTable: After you install, you can configure the Unified WIM and EIM file server on the destination system. Install Unified WIM and EIM File Server Install Unified WIM and EIM File Server To install a file server component on the Cisco Interaction Manager, perform the following steps : Procedure Step 1   Add the virtual machine into the destination domain. Step 2   Mount the Cisco WIM and EIM ISO image to the virtual machine. For more information, see Mount and Unmount ISO Files. Step 3   Run the installer file of Cisco Unified Interaction Manager The Unified E-Mail Interaction Manager & Unified Web Interaction Manager console appears. Step 4   Click Next. Step 5   Click the option I accept the terms of the License Agreement and click Next. Step 6   Check the File Server check box and click Next. Step 7   Browse to a folder to
